SAMRAI::math::ArrayDataNormOpsInteger

Detailed Description

Class ArrayDataNormOpsInteger provides a set of common norm operations that may be applied to arrays of integer data values maintained as pdat::ArrayData<TYPE> objects. The intent of this class is to provide a single implementation of these operations as they are needed by objects that perform these operations on the standard array-based patch data types (i.e., cell-centered, face-centered, node-centered). Note that each operation is performed on the intersection of the box in the function argument list and the boxes associated with all pdat::ArrayData<TYPE> objects. Currently, the only norm operation implemented in this class is the absolute value operation.

See also:
pdat::ArrayData
